alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 2:26PM AKST until December 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Damage to power lines is possible. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Noon today to noon Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is likely. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
